name: Delusion of Dynast
description:
Heavily inspired by games such as Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest, this 20+ hour experience is filled with colourful characters, strategic battles, and a bunch of references to other famous RPGs.

I worked on this project for four years, with my goal being to create an experience that both lovers of RPGs and newcomers to the genre will enjoy.

I hope you have as much fun playing Delusion of the Dynast as I did creating it.

A heartfelt thankyou to the following people, their efforts, big or small have helped shape this game into what it is today:

These people helped SO MUCH with scripting and extra functions:

-Victor Sant

-Shadowmaster9000

-Lizzie S

-Szyu

-Tsukihime

-Modern-Algebra (rmrk.net)

-Vlue

-Special Mention to Yanfly! (http://yanfly.moe/news)

Go check them out on the RPGMaker Forums! Show them some love!

These people were generous enough to let me use some of their graphics:

-O.P. Wilkituska

-2D Circle Graphics

-Setia (For the Tower of Amnesia Bell Sprite)

**Logo Designed by Kimberly Douangdara**

Lastly, thank you to the ones who provided me with the means to create this game, Enterbrain Inc.

Couldn't have done any of this without you!

N.B If you have trouble running, right click the application and make sure your firewall isn't blocking access!
